code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LanguageSwitcher=_ref=>{let{onLanguageChange}=_ref;const[language,setLanguage]=useState('ru');const toggleLanguage=()=>{const newLanguage=language==='ru'?'en':'ru';setLanguage(newLanguage);onLanguageChange(newLanguage);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleLanguage,children:language==='ru'?'Switch to English':'Переключить на русский'});};export default LanguageSwitcher;
